mapper.insert: insert into images (img_sid, img_type, img_origin_name, img_name, img_path, img_comment, img_upload_time, img_timestamp, user_account, img_note) values (#{imgSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imgTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update images set img_type = #{imgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img_origin_name = #{imgOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_name = #{imgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_path = #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_comment = #{imgComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_upload_time = #{imgUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, img_timestamp = #{imgTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_note = #{imgNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where img_sid = #{imgSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select img_sid, img_type, img_origin_name, img_name, img_path, img_comment, img_upload_time, img_timestamp, user_account, img_note from images where img_sid = #{imgSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select img_sid, img_type, img_origin_name, img_name, img_path, img_comment, img_upload_time, img_timestamp, user_account, img_note from images
select img_sid, img_name img_path, img_comment from images WHERE img_note = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
